languages.text: "Комморра испытала нас всех на прочность, и я рад, что выдержал эту проверку. Значит, на покой мне пока рано".
"Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."
languages.original_text: "Комморра испытала нас всех на прочность, и я рад, что выдержал эту проверку. Значит, на покой мне пока рано".

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “科摩罗的考验把我们每个人逼到了极限。我很高兴我承受住了这一切，这意味着我还不急着退休。”
languages.original_text: "Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."

traits.locale_text: “科摩罗的考验把我们每个人逼到了极限。我很高兴我承受住了这一切，这意味着我还不急着退休。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Commorragh nous a tous poussés dans nos derniers retranchements, mais je suis bien content d'avoir tenu bon. Ça veut dire que l'heure de ma retraite n'est pas encore venue. »
languages.original_text: "Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."

traits.locale_text: « Commorragh nous a tous poussés dans nos derniers retranchements, mais je suis bien content d'avoir tenu bon. Ça veut dire que l'heure de ma retraite n'est pas encore venue. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Commorragh nos ha puesto a todos a prueba. Me alegro de haber superado la mía: significa que todavía no es momento para jubilarme».
languages.original_text: "Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."

traits.locale_text: «Commorragh nos ha puesto a todos a prueba. Me alegro de haber superado la mía: significa que todavía no es momento para jubilarme».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「コモラフでは私たち全員が極限まで疲弊しました。その試練に耐えられたことを喜ばしく思います。まだ引退するには早すぎるということですから」
languages.original_text: "Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフでは私たち全員が極限まで疲弊しました。その試練に耐えられたことを喜ばしく思います。まだ引退するには早すぎるということですから」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Commorragh war für uns alle eine Prüfung, die uns an unsere Grenzen gebracht hat. Und ich bin froh, dass ich sie bestanden habe. Das bedeutet, dass es noch zu früh ist, um mich zur Ruhe zu setzen."
languages.original_text: "Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh war für uns alle eine Prüfung, die uns an unsere Grenzen gebracht hat. Und ich bin froh, dass ich sie bestanden habe. Das bedeutet, dass es noch zu früh ist, um mich zur Ruhe zu setzen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."

languages.text: "Commorragh hepimizin sınırlarını zorladı. İmtihanı başarıyla geçtiğim için mutluyum. Kısacası henüz emekli olma zamanım gelmiş değil."
languages.original_text: "Commorragh tested us all to our limits, and I am glad that I withstood the trial. It means that it is too early for me to retire just yet."

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh hepimizin sınırlarını zorladı. İmtihanı başarıyla tamamladığım için mutluyum. Bu, henüz emeklilik zamanımın gelmediği anlamına geliyor."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
